DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate safety performance Aortic Stapler use attach synthetic graft aorta AAA Leriche Syndrome patient
DOC.criteria: Patient age 21 85 year old . Patient diagnose Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) aortoIliac/Femoral Occlusive Arterial Disease ( Leriche ' syndrome ) CTAngio examination and/or angiography examination patient Leriche ' syndrome . Patient aneurysm neck proximal distal site 5 10 mm diameter 1622 mm . Patient schedule AAA repair Pregnant woman Active malignancy Ruptured aneurysm ThoracoAAA Patient least one follow unstable risk factor : Renal disease ( Cr > 2 ) Ischemic heart disease ( unstable Angina ) Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( contraindicate open aortic surgery respiratory function exam ) Severe CHF ( EF < 25 % ) Patient know allergy metal contrast medium Participation current recent ( within 60 day prior surgery ) clinical trial
